text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>Die Cramerischen Herren Erben und Gebrüder Philibert, Buchführer in Genff, proponiren dem PublicoSubscriptions-Weis, eine neue Edition von <BOOK_ADVERTISEMENT><BIBL><AUTHOR>M. T. Ciccronis</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Operibus</TITLE>, cum Delectu Commentariorum a <EDITOR>Josepho dOlivet</EDITOR></BIBL><EDITION_DETAILS>in schönen Pappier mit neuer Schrifft, von St. Augustini Text und Garamondi Noten; in conformität der Pariser Edition sehr correct heraus zugeben, und versprechen solches von allen darinn sich befindlichen Fehleren zu reinigen etc. das gantze Werck, welches in <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT> <VOLUME>9. Volumina</VOLUME> haltet, solle die Herren Praenumeranten nicht mehr als <PRICING><PRIZE>67 Livres Frantzösische Valuta</PRIZE> oder <PRIZE>40. Francken Genffer-Geld</PRIZE></PRICING> kosten etc. das weitere kan aus dem Project und Aviso bey Herrn Onoffrio Hoffmann allhier ersehen werden.</EDITION_DETAILS></BOOK_ADVERTISEMENT></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":19,"explanation":"The XML was corrected for both structural tagging and character encoding issues. Specifically, the following corrections were made: 1. The mismatched closing tag `<PRICE>` was changed to `</PRIZE>`. 2. A closing `</PRIZE>` tag was added for the second price entry. 3. `<AUTHOR>Josepho dOlivet</AUTHOR>` was changed to `<EDITOR>Josepho dOlivet</EDITOR>` for better semantic accuracy. 4. The original `<BIBL>` tag, which incorrectly encompassed the entire advertisement, was closed earlier, immediately after the editor's name. 5. New structural tags were introduced: `<BOOK_ADVERTISEMENT>` to wrap all details pertaining to the book being advertised, `<EDITION_DETAILS>` to contain descriptions of the book's physical attributes and publication promises, and `<PRICING>` to group price information. 6. Several malformed Unicode characters were replaced with their correct German or Latin equivalents (e.g., `\\u221a\\u00bader` to `üder`, `\\u221a\\u00bahrere` to `führer`, `\\u221a\\u2020` to `a`, `\\u221a\\u2202n` to `ön`, `\\u221a\\u00a7t` to `ät`, `\\u221a\\u2264` to `o`, `\\u221a\\u2202sische` to `ösische`, and `\\u00cd\\u00f9\\u00f5c.` to `etc.`) to improve readability and accuracy of the text content. Each such character replacement was counted as one correction."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>Die Cramerischen Herren Erben und Gebrüder Philibert, Buchführer in Genff, proponiren dem PublicoSubscriptions-Weis, eine neue Edition von <BOOK_ADVERTISEMENT><BIBL><AUTHOR>M. T. Ciccronis</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Operibus</TITLE>, cum Delectu Commentariorum a <EDITOR>Josepho dOlivet</EDITOR></BIBL><EDITION_DETAILS>in schönen Pappier mit neuer Schrifft, von St. Augustini Text und Garamondi Noten; in conformität der Pariser Edition sehr correct heraus zugeben, und versprechen solches von allen darinn sich befindlichen Fehleren zu reinigen etc. das gantze Werck, welches in <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT> <VOLUME>9. Volumina</VOLUME> haltet, solle die Herren Praenumeranten nicht mehr als <PRICING><PRIZE>67 Livres Frantzösische Valuta</PRIZE> oder <PRIZE>40. Francken Genffer-Geld</PRIZE></PRICING> kosten etc. das weitere kan aus dem Project und Aviso bey Herrn Onoffrio Hoffmann allhier ersehen werden.</EDITION_DETAILS></BOOK_ADVERTISEMENT></ITEM>
parsed.explanation: The XML was corrected for both structural tagging and character encoding issues. Specifically, the following corrections were made: 1. The mismatched closing tag `<PRICE>` was changed to `</PRIZE>`. 2. A closing `</PRIZE>` tag was added for the second price entry. 3. `<AUTHOR>Josepho dOlivet</AUTHOR>` was changed to `<EDITOR>Josepho dOlivet</EDITOR>` for better semantic accuracy. 4. The original `<BIBL>` tag, which incorrectly encompassed the entire advertisement, was closed earlier, immediately after the editor's name. 5. New structural tags were introduced: `<BOOK_ADVERTISEMENT>` to wrap all details pertaining to the book being advertised, `<EDITION_DETAILS>` to contain descriptions of the book's physical attributes and publication promises, and `<PRICING>` to group price information. 6. Several malformed Unicode characters were replaced with their correct German or Latin equivalents (e.g., `\u221a\u00bader` to `üder`, `\u221a\u00bahrere` to `führer`, `\u221a\u2020` to `a`, `\u221a\u2202n` to `ön`, `\u221a\u00a7t` to `ät`, `\u221a\u2264` to `o`, `\u221a\u2202sische` to `ösische`, and `\u00cd\u00f9\u00f5c.` to `etc.`) to improve readability and accuracy of the text content. Each such character replacement was counted as one correction.
